mapper.insert: insert into videoreview (vr_id, user_id, vr_text, state, praises, reply, start_time, end_time) values (#{vrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vrText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{praises,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update videoreview set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vr_text = #{vrText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, praises = #{praises,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reply = #{reply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where vr_id = #{vrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vr_id, user_id, vr_text, state, praises, reply, start_time, end_time from videoreview
